personal-brand: If I had to define myself in three words, they would be Perfectionism, Creativity, and Perseverance.
about-me-p-1: Web developer with a strong focus on JavaScript, both in its native form and working with modern technologies such as React and NodeJS.
about-me-p-2: I have worked with relational (MySQL) and non-relational (MongoDB) databases, and I have experience using Git for version control.
about-me-p-3: I apply best practices in layout, code structure, and performance optimization, always striving to make the code clean, readable, and maintainable.
author-image-about-me-section: Author image in the "About me" section

footer.designed: Freely designed with <react>React</react> and <tailwind>Tailwind CSS</tailwind> and coded in <vscode>Visual Studio Code</vscode> by me. Deployed with <netlify>Netlify</netlify>.

frase-hero: Expert in custom interfaces and advanced data management

about-section.introduction: I am a developer with almost<important-sentence-1>4 years of experience</important-sentence-1>, specialized in creating<important-sentence-2>unique, high-demand, or fully custom designs tailored to each client or company</important-sentence-2>. I design and develop<important-sentence-3>robust REST APIs with full CRUD functionality, handling and manipulating all types of data with secure authentication</important-sentence-3>. I define myself as:
about-section.problem-solving-text: I bring new ideas and solutions to any situation and focus on the client's needs.
about-section.responsible-text: Committed to caring for every detail, every pixel matters.
about-section.consistent-text: Every goal must be achieved on the agreed date or event.
about-section.collaborative-text: A boat doesn’t move with only one sailor. Let’s row together in the same direction.
